name: Github Capabilities
description: Evaluation dataset for GitHub subagent capabilities including PRs, issues, commits, and repository operations. Includes lazy queries, intentional mistakes, and ambiguous items requiring resolution.

items.input: make pr for insane-mail branch to develop in gaia-personal
items.expected_output: 1. Search for repository 'gaia-personal'. 2. Identify 'Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal'. 3. Create PR from insane-mail branch to develop.
items.context: User provided partial repo name

items.input: Show me all open pull requests in Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal.
items.expected_output: List of open pull requests displayed.
items.context: User wants to see open PRs

items.input: ask aryanranderiya to review pr 9 in Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personl
items.expected_output: 1. Attempt to access 'Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personl'. 2. Catch error/notice typo. 3. Search/Correct to 'Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal'. 4. Request review from aryanranderiya on PR #9.
items.context: User made a typo in repo name (gaia-personl instead of gaia-personal)

items.input: what files changed in pr 10 gaia-personal?
items.expected_output: 1. Search for repository 'gaia-personal'. 2. Identify 'Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal'. 3. List files changed in PR #10.
items.context: User provided partial repo name

items.input: Please add a comment to PR #11 in Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal asking the author to add unit tests for the new authentication logic.
items.expected_output: Comment added to PR #11.
items.context: User wants to add a detailed review comment

items.input: merge pr #11 in Dhruv-Mradia/gaia-personal
items.expected_output: 1. Detect invalid owner 'Dhruv-Mradia'. 2. Search for 'gaia-personal' or check user's repos. 3. Correct to 'Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal'. 4. Merge PR #9.
items.context: User made a typo in owner name (Dhruv-Mradia instead of Dhruv-Maradiya)

items.input: commits in pr 10 Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal
items.expected_output: List of commits in PR #10 shown.
items.context: User asking about PR #10 in Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal

items.input: Create a bug report for the login page failure and assign it to aryanranderiya in gaia-personal.
items.expected_output: 1. Search for repository 'gaia-personal'. 2. Identify 'Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal'. 3. Create issue and assign to aryanranderiya.
items.context: User provided partial repo name

items.input: mark issue 1 as bug in Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal
items.expected_output: Label 'bug' added to issue #1.
items.context: User wants to label issue #1 in Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal

items.input: lock issue 2 in Dhruv-Maradiya/gaiaa
items.expected_output: 1. Attempt to access 'Dhruv-Maradiya/gaiaa'. 2. Catch error/notice typo. 3. Search/Correct to 'Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal'. 4. Lock issue #2.
items.context: User made a typo in repo name (gaiaa)

items.input: list my issues in gaia-personal
items.expected_output: 1. Search for repository 'gaia-personal'. 2. Identify 'Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal'. 3. List issues assigned to user.
items.context: User provided partial repo name

items.input: Create a new label named 'tech-debt' with color 'cccccc' in Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal.
items.expected_output: Label created.
items.context: User wants to create a specific label

items.input: change labels on issue 3 to enhancement backend in Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal
items.expected_output: Labels on issue #3 replaced with 'enhancement' and 'backend'.
items.context: User wants to replace labels on issue #3 in Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal

items.input: Check if user 'aryanranderiya' has permission to be assigned to issues in Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal, and if so, assign them to issue #4.
items.expected_output: Permissions checked and user assigned.
items.context: User wants to verify permissions before assigning

items.input: diff last 2 commits on main in gaia-personal
items.expected_output: 1. Search for repository 'gaia-personal'. 2. Identify 'Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal'. 3. Compare last 2 commits on main.
items.context: User provided partial repo name

items.input: fork Dhruv-Mradia/gaia-personal
items.expected_output: 1. Detect invalid owner 'Dhruv-Mradia'. 2. Search/Correct to 'Dhruv-Maradiya'. 3. Fork 'Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal' (or handle error if already exists/same user).
items.context: User made a typo in owner name

items.input: find issues about 'shortcuts' in Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal
items.expected_output: Search results for 'shortcuts' issues shown.
items.context: User wants to search issues in Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal

items.input: Read the README file of Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal repository.
items.expected_output: README content displayed.
items.context: User wants to read the README

items.input: show branches in gaia-personal
items.expected_output: 1. Search for repository 'gaia-personal'. 2. Identify 'Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal'. 3. List branches.
items.context: User provided partial repo name

items.input: Create a new private repository named 'my-tool'.
items.expected_output: Private repository 'my-tool' created.
items.context: User wants to create a new repo

items.input: add aryanranderiya to my-tool
items.expected_output: 1. Search for 'my-tool' in user's repositories. 2. Identify 'Dhruv-Maradiya/my-tool'. 3. Add aryanranderiya as collaborator.
items.context: User provided partial repo name (assumed to be owned by user)

items.input: Get the content of 'backend/app/config/secrets.py' from Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal.
items.expected_output: File content displayed.
items.context: User wants to read a specific file

items.input: Check branch protection rules for 'main' branch in Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal.
items.expected_output: Branch protection rules displayed.
items.context: User wants to check branch protection

items.input: repos for user Dhruv-Maradiya
items.expected_output: List of repositories for user Dhruv-Maradiya.
items.context: User wants to list user repos

items.input: Search for all repositories related to 'python agents' created after 2023.
items.expected_output: Search results displayed.
items.context: User wants to search for repositories

items.input: lock issue 5 in gaia-personal
items.expected_output: 1. Search for repository 'gaia-personal'. 2. Identify 'Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal'. 3. Lock issue #5.
items.context: User provided partial repo name

items.input: Delete the label 'wontfix' from Dhruv-Maradiya/gaia-personal.
items.expected_output: Label 'wontfix' deleted.
items.context: User wants to delete a label
